name: Mademoiselle Orange and Monsieur Green - a puzzle game.
name_original: Mademoiselle Orange and Monsieur Green - a puzzle game.
description:
Short puzzle game made in a day for the GMTK game jam 2021.

You need to guide Mademoiselle Orange and Monsieur Green to each other using keyboard controls, they are both controlled by the ADWS keys.

Sounds like fun. 

Comments are welcomed.

Credits:

Game design and programming -

Mike Bailey
